MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:32PM in the SY21 postcode area of Berriew, Welshpool following unconfirmed reports of a grounded overhead line caused by a 3rd party. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team has arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:15PM on 29th October 2020
